name: delete-adf-pipelines-triggers
description: Delete Azure Data Factory pipelines and triggers after check the resource group is not locked.
author: David Osorno G

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown:
This is needed to connect to your Azure account.
To configure new service connection, select the Azure subscription from the list and click 'Authorize'.
If your subscription is not listed or if you want to use an existing Service Principal, you can setup an Azure service connection using 'Add' or 'Manage' button.

inputs.name: DatafactoryType
inputs.label: Data Integration Capabilities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Analytics

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the resource group.

inputs.name: DatafactoryName
inputs.label: Azure Data Factory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Azure Data Factory.

inputs.name: WorkspaceUrl
inputs.label: Synapse workspace development endpoint URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Synapse workspace development endpoint, eg. https://myworkspace.dev.azuresynapse.net

inputs.name: ServiceFilter
inputs.label: Linked Service Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Regex filter to determine which linked service to delete.
-Empty string: *none* linked services will be deleted.
-`*`: *all* linked services will be deleted.

inputs.name: PipelineFilter
inputs.label: Pipeline Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Regex filter to determine which pipeline to delete.
-Empty string: *none* pipelines will be deleted.
-`*`: *all* pipelines will be deleted.

inputs.name: DataflowFilter
inputs.label: Data flow Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Regex filter to determine which data flow to delete.
-Empty string: *none* data flows will be deleted.
-`*`: *all* data flows will be deleted.

inputs.name: DatasetFilter
inputs.label: Dataset Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Regex filter to determine which datasets to delete.
-Empty string: *none* datasets will be deleted.
-`*`: *all* datasets will be deleted.

inputs.name: TriggerFilter
inputs.label: Trigger Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Filter to determine which trigger to delete.
-Empty string: *none* triggers will be deleted.
-`*`: *all* triggers will be deleted.

inputs.name: Throttle
inputs.label: Number of parallel actions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of parallel actions, default is 5

inputs.name: Sorting
inputs.label: Set sorting direction of the delete order

inputs.name: detectDependancy
inputs.label: Detect object dependancy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Option to scan deployment files to detect dependancy between the same objects types. This dependancy is used to sort the deploy order.
